mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO as memberNo, EMAIL as username, PASSWORD as password, AUTHORITY as authority FROM MEMBER_TB WHERE EMAIL = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_TB(email, password, MEMBER_NAME, authority, SIGNUP_DATE) VALUES(#{email},#{password},#{name},#{authority}, current_timestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_NO, GROUP_AUTHORITY FROM MEMBER_GROUP_TB WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
